website_summaries.verdict: Cleansing oil that both cleans skin and removes makeup quickly and gently.
pros: Great for removing makeup, including waterproof makeup
Cleans without drying skin but contains no mineral oil
Can be used by those with both oily and dry skin
cons: A small minority had skin reactions to the cleanser

customer_reviews.title: Total cleansing and soft skin
customer_reviews.text: I am 80 and have The VERY dry skin that comes with age, this product is amazing, I would buy it at twice the price, it lasts forever and while I still have wrinkles, they r very soft and VERY clean!!️ Treat yourself and buy it, you’ll never go back
customer_reviews.author: Howard Boasberg

customer_reviews.title: By far the most amazing face wash oil I have ever came across!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you don't make the mistake of wetting your face before using this! You must apply it to a dry face and rub it in before washing off! I'm sure a lot of people have made this mistake and ended up not liking this product. You're doing it wrong! Once you use it on a dry face you'll be hooked! I love this product and I have skin prone to acne, but this does not make me break out!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Inskeep

customer_reviews.title: SO NICE
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those of you who have dry or sensitive skin! It cleanses without stripping your face of all the oils! It gets off EVERY BIT of makeup! Gets off even the toughest and most long wear foundation, eyeshadows, and lash glue!!
customer_reviews.author: Ember

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff! I had a small sample bottle and I was blown away so I bought the larger bottle. I don't usually purchase expense face cleansers but this is definitely worth it. Not only does it remove makeup that still might be on but it leaves my face feeling moisturized and fresh. Plus, it lasted me an entire year! You only need a very small amount so don't overdo it or you'll waste it and run out fast.
customer_reviews.author: KayKay

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive the item pictured.
customer_reviews.text: The picture is for the 150 mL size product but I received the 25mL size. I would never pay almost $60 for 25mL. I am returning the item and going else where for my product.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Crone

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cleanser! I have highly sensitive skin that breaks out constantly, i tried this oil cleanser and it cleared my skin and made it baby smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Corgi Lover

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: My son bought some of the other product line for my birthday and Camellia Cleansing Oil was a sample. I used it and feel in love with it. It took off my 24hr mascara without rubbing within seconds. Very gentle on my face. Did not feel greasy after I washed off. My skin just felt soft. I was a little worried about trying the sample at first because I do have oily skin. Don't expect a lathering soap, it's not like that. You need very little of the product to work, so use sparingly. The product line is pricy, BUT the product will last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Lreyes

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. Takes every bit of makeup off. I only use a pump or two on dry skin before jumping in the shower or I use a wet washcloth if I'm not showering. My skin is so soft. Pricey but worth it. I'd buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleansing oil for my dry skin. It removes makeup and leaves skin soft. It is an easy two step cleanser. First massage into skin to remove make up. Then lather with a small amount of water and rinse!
customer_reviews.author: C. roth

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and non irritating
customer_reviews.text: This is a oil cleanser great for removing makeup. Its gentle nondrying and leaves my skin glowing.
customer_reviews.author: deanna cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few months now after getting the sample size from Sephora. Let me tell you this product has done wonders to my skin, I wash it and my skin is left feeling clean and moisturized afterwards- which is something that other cleansers don’t do. I have combination dry skin so I’ve found oil cleansers to be more beneficial. Paired along with the water cream and my skin is as fresh and smooth as a baby. I definitely recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good cleanser but Irritating for lips
customer_reviews.text: The product is good for what it’s supposed to do, cleanse. However, I have sensitive lips. In the process of washing my face, it is bound to touch the border of my lips. I’ve been using for a week now, and my lips are always irritated and itchy around the border. This is the same reaction I have to all chapsticks other than Vaseline. For those with sensitive lips, I don’t recommend this oil cleanser. It’s great at cleansing and feels great, but it may irritate the other parts of your face.
customer_reviews.author: Jieyi

customer_reviews.title: "Love to Hate Oil"
customer_reviews.text: I have always hated anything to do with oil on my skin, but this product came by way of review from Allure Magazine. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Eliz5

customer_reviews.title: The BEST makeup remover on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I've bee using Tatcha camellia cleansing oil for years along with all other Tatcha facial products. This clensing oil is one of the best, easiest and most gentle makekup removers you will ever find on the market! It does everything it says it will do without any harm or irritation to the skin. I use it daily to remove makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa2

customer_reviews.title: I usually love their products but this one failed
customer_reviews.text: I usually love their products but this one failed. It definitely takes many pumps to get your makeup completely off. Way too expensive for such little results.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ashley Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product my kids got it for me Mother’s Day one year. Priced reasonably for retail stores such as Sephora and tatcha website. Best I’ve found for eye makeup removal. It’s a luxury beauty product but sometimes quality is better than quality. Would recommend as great skin care product. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna D Davis

customer_reviews.title: Would give 500 stars if I could
customer_reviews.text: This product is literally like magic. I have tried a million different face washes and makeup removers and nothing works even remotely like this. It feels really smooth, smells great, and works instantly. Put 2 pumps on dry hands and massage into your face then rinse with water... magic! Will never use anything else again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting more from this
customer_reviews.text: It glides easily and it doesn't break out my sensitive skin, which is great, but I was remembering it as a more luxurious product from some years ago when I had a small bottle. Somehow I am underwhelmed by it. :( It smells nice but the smell is too faint and doesn't give me that spa experience I was remembering. I will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: PompiliaB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since Day 1. Best face cleaner I have ever purchased and I will continue to use your products. Fast shipping - Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Roy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend!!! The cleansing oil is amazing, and removes every trace of makeup. I no longer have to buy an oil based eye makeup remover!!! This product actually removes waterproof mascara better and is more gentle than oil based eye makeup remover. I gently rubbed the oil into my lashes and every trace of waterproof mascara was gone. Two products for the price of one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wells860

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Man, this stuff is awesome. Totally removes all my makeup, even stubborn eyeliner. I never wake up in the morning looking like a monster covered in black crusties.
customer_reviews.author: Kalee

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product not hardh on your face, it lifts makeup from your skin without drying your skin. I love this product DollFace on youtube did a review on this and it is amazing
customer_reviews.author: DTRUSSELL

customer_reviews.title: Love the Tatcha line !!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cleanser I’ve used for years !! Cleans my skin and leaves it feeling moisturized but not greasy !!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret S.

customer_reviews.title: great option for sensitive skin and daily use
customer_reviews.text: my skin is very sensitive, everything else leaves it too oily or too dry or gives me a rash. this cleansing oil worked for me very well, is the second time I buy it. the only issue is that you definitely need an extra cleaner. this one doesnt take away all the makeup. it is more for a daily use. not for after party cleaner hah.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: No worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I still be having makeup on my face. This stuff too expensive for me to still have makeup on my face after applying this. Yes I followed directing "dry hands"
customer_reviews.author: Doretha

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample size of this in my Ipsy bag and it is by far one of the best products I have ever used. Very gentle on the skin, I have never broken out from it, but also very effective. I wear waterproof eyeliner and mascara and this cleanser takes it off with just easy wash! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Audra Clodfelter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for delicate skin
customer_reviews.text: Very good for sensitive skin. Glides on and off. Leaves skin soft.
customer_reviews.author: Carol P Kusama

customer_reviews.title: It is great! The current cost is three times what i ...
customer_reviews.text: The product I rate 5. It is great! The current cost is three times what i purchased it for previously. For that I rated 3.
customer_reviews.author: Superwoman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This gets all my makeup off so easily! No need to wet your face first. I just rub it all over my face, let it sit while I get ready to take a shower, and then wash it off when I get in. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had oily skin and never thought to take my makeup up with an oil product. Yet, I absolutely love this. I already have noticed an improvement in my skin. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: adriana lorio

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best cleanser I’ve ever used. It’s so gentle and leaves my sensitive skin feeling soft and clean. I also love that it has limited ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: K Miller

customer_reviews.title: Will never go back to makeup remover wipes
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rave about this product enough!! Has completely changed my skincare routine. I’ve used other 1 step cleansers in the past but none that have completely removed my makeup and completely cleansed my skin. It is gentle and my skin is the softest it’s ever been!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but totally amazing. I only use it at night to take ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is expensive as heck, but totally amazing. I only use it at night to take my makeup off and cleanse and it comes off like butter. Amazing. I am a convert.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Removing my makeup... fabulous. Love this product. Not greasy. Leaves my skin soft but not oily. Would highly recommend this product for any age.
customer_reviews.author: nancy goodwin

customer_reviews.title: One step cleansing
customer_reviews.text: Dissolves all my makeup including eyeliner . Very convenient—one step cleansing. Rinses off easily.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Skin for the First Time in My Life
customer_reviews.text: I have had acne all my life. This Tatcha products is the only thing I’ve ever used that has controlled it. My skin looks beautiful for the first time in my life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissolves make up
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. Clean finish and feels good on.
customer_reviews.author: Bette Milleson

customer_reviews.title: Removes waterproof mascara
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Great cleaner and does not cause breakouts. Removes waterproof mascara with no problem. Love the whole Tatcha skin care line
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanser I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended this cleanser to me when I ran out of my old one. I love it from the first time. My skin just feels so balanced after using this cleanser. Most cleansers leave a very dry skin but this one doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Kwen Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Great product#1!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful!! It's soft on the skin with no harsh ingredients, parabens, sulfates, etc. It also appears to be gluten free and dairy free, which matters to me. I am a cancer survivor and a cancer treatment survivor, so this is a great choice for me. It smells light and fresh. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Good but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I really like TATCHA 1-step Camellia cleansing oil, and the Polishing Rice Enzyme Powder. It leaves my face, which is dry, feeling soft and silky. If not for the exorbitant price I would be a customer for life. If you can afford it, you won't be disappointed. The price is better on TATCHA's web site & QVC. Even then......just too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Margot

customer_reviews.title: Not oily or greasy
customer_reviews.text: It cleans the skin nicely while removing making as well. Never felt greasy and skin looks great!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen austin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best skin care product I have ever used. Price point is high so I am selective.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. He’s soft for my sensitive skin and it makes perfect make-up !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Someone recommended I use this oil cleanser to remove my make ...
customer_reviews.text: Someone recommended I use this oil cleanser to remove my make up at a night and that it helped with their acne. I have not seen any improvements in the acne department, however, I really do enjoy using this cleanser. It leaves skin feeling very soft and as a first step of removing make up at night, I feel like it does far better than using a make up wipe. I like that it is in a pump but my only dislike is that there is not a whole lot of product, considering the price. I may purchase again in the future, but I will definitely keep my eyes peeled for an alternative oil cleanser for a second go.
customer_reviews.author: N. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product over a year. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: DESIREE GILLINGHAM

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!! Takes off makeup quickly, and leaves my face feeling clean and fresh! Not oily at all!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my skin has changed thru the years and this leaves it so soft.workswonders as well.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It removes all of the makeup and it doesn't over dry my skin. I would recommend it to anyone who is acne prone and wants a product that is gentle and doesn't over dry your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I have been using it for two ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I have been using it for two years and will continue. I refer it to all my friends.

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Super moisturizing and gentle and is a great way to take off makeup.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product! Leaves my skin hydrated and smooth after use. This will be stocked in my cabinet from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Savings..
customer_reviews.text: This product is much cheaper here than the shopping channel..Love this product..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely isn't a "1-step". Still find foundation on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely isn't a "1-step". Still find foundation on my facial cleansing brush after 4 pumps of this oil. I prefer my Clinique Take the Day Away Cleansing Balm and it's almost half the price. It'll do the job at removing the majority of makeup but definitely use a cleanser afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Irritated my skin
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to irritate my skin and cause rash. My skin is usually clear but upon using this product, I got redness and little red bumps on my face, giving it uneven texture. Took me a couple weeks to realize the cause. So I stopped, and my skin returned to normal. Then I used it again, and my skin immediately got rash. So it must have been something in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pomai

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a couple of years and love it! It is so gentle and easy to use. Be sure and apply to a dry face with dry hands, as the water will emulsify it on contact. It is a wonderful, non-irritating, eye makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Bill n Suz

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Just love this cleansing oil. It cleanses wonderfully and gets all of my makeup off. Non greasy, leaves skin soft and doesn't break out my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernGirl

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Every evening I use this product to remove my makeup, dirt and sunscreen. I highly recommend this product for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kuklamu

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST FACE PRODUCT EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth every cent. I bought it based on a blogger's recommendation and am totally in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: skilletlicker

customer_reviews.title: I know people say they have tried everything but I really have tried so many products and this cleanser is AMAZING! You will not
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute skin care product in the world. I know people say they have tried everything but I really have tried so many products and this cleanser is AMAZING! You will not be disappointed with this stuff.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleansing oil. Washes off and leaves skin soft not oily.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it, very mild for my sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it , very mild for my sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser. I have dry skin and it helps keep my skin moist.

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and leave my skin clean
customer_reviews.text: The price is expensive, but no fragrance, easy to use and leave my skin clean. Best ever.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best way to wash your face. Its what the geisha's use

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash you will ever use!!
customer_reviews.text: Third purchase of this product. By far, the best cleansing wash you will ever use. No mineral oil, takes your eye makeup off like a dream. Face is clean and not drying. Two pumps is all it takes for a completely clean face. I purchased it previously on QVC, but better value on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Mcd

customer_reviews.title: This is HORRIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 0 if I could!!! I received an OLD USED piece of JUNK!!!!!!!!!! I've placed HUNDREDS of orders and it NEVER happened before!!!!!!!!This is HORRIBLE!!!! I don't even bother returning it but throw it into trash!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy.L

customer_reviews.title: Dont really like it, its way too oily and doesnt foam
customer_reviews.text: Dont really like it, its way too oily and doesnt foam. I suppose it would be helpful for someone with extra dry skin. It also doesnt remove my makeup as I thought it would. I am sad I spent so much money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing cleanser. This has transformed my skin from a ...
customer_reviews.text: Most amazing cleanser. This has transformed my skin from a dry acne mess to beautiful , clear and soft skin. Highly recommend for acne skin....don't be afraid of the oil it rinses completely and leaves behind clean not dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: robbyn h

customer_reviews.title: Great cleansing oil, great luxury skincare line
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleansing oil! it won't make you break out, but it will make your skin softer. it also delivers a ton of antioxidants (which help repair free radical damage to your skin/are antiaging) and can help heal/fade acne scars or marks. Mostly, it protects the integrity of your skin's natural oil barrier (which is there as a form of protection for our skin). When the oil barrier of our skin is compromises, from harsh stripping cleansers, etc., it makes you more likely to react to products and experience negative symptoms on your skin. Camellia oil = great. I trust this skincare line. Can't wait to try their exfoliant!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe  Make-up remover
customer_reviews.text: I am hooked on this wonderful make-up remover. It is easy to use, and leaves my skin soft, and free of all make-up, even removes heavy waterproof mascara. I have extremely sensitive skin, and am allergic to many products,. I've tried numerous remover products, at any price. No tugging, or pulling. A small amount goes a long way! Just follow the directions, and the results speak for themselves. I'm so glad I tried this . Even light brown spots and a few blemishes are fading away. That is an unexpected plus. Now, I cannot use anything else. I would buy it by the quart, if I could afford it! Cheers, s.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Best Cleanser Ever
customer_reviews.text: My very favorite cleanser ever. Although I love other Tatcha products, they are too expensive so I am down to only using this cleanser and rice powder exfoliant. This cleanser melts the makeup off your face easily, great for mascara removal with out the tugging at your sensitive skin around the eyes. Highly recommend the cleanser if nothing else from Tatcha.
customer_reviews.author: Peggyann

customer_reviews.title: Tatcha Fan
customer_reviews.text: My aunt used to use this product and before she passed, sent me this facewash. After years of suffering with combo skin and light acne, this wash was a welcomed change. I've probably tried everything but will never stop using Tatcha. Gently and thoroughly removes makeup leaving my skin soft and clean. It's not cheap but it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin, rosacea, and eczema
customer_reviews.text: I have highly sensitive skin and get awful rashes from citrus. This cleanser is the best oil cleanser that I've found. I was concerned about the cost but you only need a little bit and it's lasting much longer than I'd expected. My pubescent daughter is using it now too and the eczema on her cheeks is no longer bugging her this winter while still helping with teenage acne.
customer_reviews.author: Norcalchica

customer_reviews.title: Better than balm
customer_reviews.text: Have not been disappointed with any Tatcha product. This cleansing oil is perfect for my rosacea and doesn't dry out my skin. I've tried other cleansers (even from a dermatologist) as well as balms. This beats them all!
customer_reviews.author: J. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Cleans without leaving an oily residue, there is no fragrance that I detect. Six little drops in the palm of my hand and then I gently press into my face and swirl in a circular motion. It's gentle and effective. I'm very happy with all the Tatcha products. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: fragrance4me

customer_reviews.title: Removes make up well
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to remember not to wet my face before using this but I love it! It takes my make right off especially my eye make up and mascara. The best part is it doesn’t irritate my eyes at all while scrubbing the mascara off! The tatcha products are good size too
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: good cleansing oil
customer_reviews.text: I love anything Tatcha. This cleansing oil doesn't disappoint. I am a k-beauty fan. This oil goes on smooth and rinses off all makeup and makes your skin feel clean. I always follow with cleansing water but I love this oil.
customer_reviews.author: C. Michelle Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I been using the Tatcha system for almost a month now and I've noticed a difference in my skin already. My skin looks a lot better. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Loving the Tatcha Products
customer_reviews.text: Works great at taking off makeup. Used along with the rice polish and my skin feels amazing! I have new favorites in my beauty regimen!!
customer_reviews.author: jab

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I started using Tatcha products over a year ago and I love this oil! It may be a little pricier than other products, but I absolutely love the results. Very high quality!
customer_reviews.author: kristyg

customer_reviews.title: Tatcha Cleansing Oil
customer_reviews.text: Tatcha one step cleansing oil really takes off all make up just take a small amt with dry hands then rinse . Wished it was not so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: J. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: So gentle! Leaves my skin soft and touchable without feeling greasy. I have very dry skin and this is pretty terrific.
customer_reviews.author: jessaquiler

customer_reviews.title: Tatcha Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I started using Tatcha products for a few months now and I have sensitive skin. I love this cleanser. I double cleanse at night. I use this, then a scrub and lastly, my face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Ehurgo808

customer_reviews.title: Works Extremely Well
customer_reviews.text: I swim for exercise, outside, which means I have to wear very heavy zinc-based sun screen, which is almost impossible to get off afterwards. With this cleansing oil, it just melts away. Amazing. It also leaves my aging skin extremely soft. Love this product.

customer_reviews.title: but not my favorite, it made my skin Break out
customer_reviews.text: I have used lots of cleansing oils, this one is ok, but not my favorite, it made my skin Break out...for the price a bit of a disappointment in truth.

customer_reviews.title: Good to remove makeup and sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. It removes makeup from sensitive skin effectively and without causing any irritation.

customer_reviews.text: Smelled pretty, but not any better than $10 cleansing oils.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Works well and leaves my skin soft and smooth. So gentle

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: its really soft on my skin and it feels great!

customer_reviews.text: I love the way this makes my skin feel soft and supple for days. I use this about twice a week. I would recommend this to anyone!!

customer_reviews.text: I tried few other oil cleaner and this is the only one the doesn't make my skin break out and get white heads. And skin feels so smooth, never dry or oily.

customer_reviews.text: Have used Bare Minerals products for years and like the quality and variety

customer_reviews.text: Love this cleansing oil - when you add water to your face, it turns into a creamy milky face wash. Gave some to my Mom and she loves it at 89!!

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. When I run out I notice my skin is gross. I missed you Tatcha. I'm ordering you again!
customer_reviews.author: J. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: I like using this cleansing oil
customer_reviews.text: I like using this cleansing oil. It takes off my makeup and it does not dry out my skin.

customer_reviews.text: Product didn’t seem like the kind I ordered off QVC . No fragrance to this one like the other. Is this a knock off?

product_meta.title: Tatcha Pure One Step Camellia Cleansing Oil: 2 in 1 Makeup Remover to Gently Cleanse and Dissolve Waterproof Makeup Leaving Silky Skin - 150 ml | 5.1 oz
feature_bullets: THIS 2-IN-1 makeup remover and cleanser of Camellia Oil gently melts away impurities, even waterproof makeup, leaving behind pure, silky soft skin.

THOROUGHLY CLEANSES the skin without stripping it of its natural moisture, leaving skin balanced and nourished. It does not contain mineral oil, so the liquid emulsifies completely and leaves no oily residue. Ideal for all skin types.

JAPANESE CAMELLIA OIL (Tsubaki): Richer in oleic acid than olive oil and an excellent source of Vitamins A, B, D and E and nourishing Omegas 3, 6, and 9, this featherweight botanical oil has been prized in Asia for centuries for its superb moisturizing and antioxidant activity.
HADASEI-3 COMPLEX: Tatcha's proprietary trio of Japanese anti-aging superfoods—Green Tea, Rice and Algae—helps to restore healthy-looking, youthful radiance.

FORMULATED WITHOUT: Mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, parabens, urea, DEA, TEA or phthalates. Our Pure Formula Promise: Non-comedogenic. Non-irritating. Non-sensitizing. Dermatologist tested. Cruelty-free.
